revised_title: Assessing Environmental Impact of Chemical Substances: Molecular Structure and Potential Hazards
tldr: The article discusses the challenges of predicting the potential hazards of chemical substances based on their molecular structure. It explores the use of data banks and structure-activity relationships to anticipate environmental impacts and toxic effects. The author presents a case study on the sulphonamide group, demonstrating the diverse biological properties and difficulties in rationalizing these observations in terms of detailed chemical structure.
